panels.name: Average Tx rate(Kbps)
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixGwNetStats
| parse "name=* " as Gateway
| parse "total_tx_rate=*Kb" as tx_rate | avg(tx_rate) as Avg_Tx_Rate_Kbps by Gateway

panels.name: Disk usage(%)
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixGwSysStats
| parse "name=* " as Gateway
| parse "disk_free=*" as disk_free | toLong(disk_free)
| parse "disk_total=* " as disk_total | toLong(disk_total)
| 100*(disk_total-disk_free)/disk_total as disk_usage
| last(disk_usage) as Disk_usage by Gateway

panels.name: Average Rx rate(Kbps)
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixGwNetStats
| parse "name=* " as Gateway
| parse "total_rx_rate=*Kb" as rx_rate | avg(rx_rate) as Avg_Rx_Rate_Kbps by Gateway

panels.name: Peak CPU Utilization(%)
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixGwSysStats
| parse "name=* " as Gateway
| parse "cpu_idle=* " as cpu_idle | 100-cpu_idle as cpu_time | max(cpu_time) as Peak_CPU_Utilization by Gateway

panels.name: Peak Tx rate(Kbps)
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixGwNetStats
| parse "name=* " as Gateway
| parse "total_tx_rate=*Kb" as tx_rate | max(tx_rate) as Peak_Tx_Rate_Kbps by Gateway

panels.name: Peak Rx rate(Kbps)
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixGwNetStats
| parse "name=* " as Gateway
| parse "total_rx_rate=*Kb" as rx_rate | max(rx_rate) as Peak_Rx_Rate_Kbps by Gateway

panels.name: Average CPU utilization(%)
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixGwSysStats
| parse "name=* " as Gateway
| parse "cpu_idle=* " as cpu_idle | 100-cpu_idle as cpu_time | avg(cpu_time) as Avg_CPU_Idle by Gateway

panels.name: Top 10 VPN users
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixVPNSession 
|parse "Duration=*:*:*:*," as days,hr,min,sec
|days*86400+hr*3600+min*60+sec as dur 
|parse "User=*," as User 
|parse "Gateway=*," as Gateway 
|sum(dur) as Time_Sec by User
|sort Time_Sec
|limit 10

panels.name: Top 10 destination ports
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixUser 
|parse "DPT=* " as Destination_Port
|count by Destination_Port | limit 10

panels.name: VPN users(hh mm ss)
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixVPNSession 
|parse "Duration=*:*:*:*," as days,hr,min,sec
|days*86400+hr*3600+min*60+sec as dur 
|parse "User=*," as User 
|parse "Gateway=*," as Gateway 
|sum(dur) as Total_Dur by User
|floor(Total_Dur/3600) as hours | toLong(hours)
|floor(Total_Dur/60-hours*60) as minutes | toLong(minutes)
|floor(Total_Dur-hours*3600-minutes*60) as seconds | toLong(seconds)
|format ("%02d:%02d:%02d", hours, minutes, seconds) as Total_Time
|sort Total_Dur 
|fields User,Total_Time

panels.name: Aviatrix Gateway locations by number of connections
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixVPNSession 
|parse "GatewayIP=*," as GatewayIP 
|parse "Gateway=*," as Gateway
|lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code, area_code, metro_code from geo://default on ip = GatewayIP
|count by Gateway,latitude, longitude, country_name, region, city
|sort _count

panels.name: Top 10 Destination IPs
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixUser 
|parse "DST=* " as Destination_IP
|count by Destination_IP | limit 10

panels.name: Gateway utilization time
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixVPNSession 
| parse "Duration=*:*:*:*," as hr,min,sec,ms | hr*3600+min*60+sec as dur | parse "User=*," as User | parse "Gateway=*," as Gateway| sum(dur) as Total_duration by Gateway | sort Total_duration

panels.name: Accepted domain names
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixFQDNRule "state=MATCHED" "process_http()"
| parse "Gateway=* " as Gateway
| parse "hostname=* " as hostname
| count as Num_connections by hostname

panels.name: Blocked domain names
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixFQDNRule "state=NO_MATCH"
| parse "Gateway=* " as Gateway
| parse "hostname=* " as hostname
| count by hostname

panels.name: Rx Bytes
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixVPNSession
|parse "RXbytes=*KB," as rc 
|parse "User=*," as User
|parse "Gateway=*," as Gateway
|sum(rc) as Total_RX_Bytes by User

panels.name: TX Bytes
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixVPNSession 
|parse "TXbytes=*KB" as tc 
|parse "User=*," as User 
|parse "Gateway=*," as Gateway 
|sum(tc) by User

panels.name: Accessed ports
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" Aviatrix* | join 
(parse "AviatrixVPNSession: User=*, Status=*, Gateway=*, GatewayIP=*, VPNVirtualIP=*, " as User, status, Gateway, gateway_ip, vpn_virtual_ip) as t1, 
(parse "SRC=* " as src| parse "DPT=* " as dpt) as t2
on t1.vpn_virtual_ip=t2.src
| t1_gateway as Gateway
| t1_user as User
|count as number_of_connections by t2_dpt

panels.name: VPN connections by SRC and DST IP
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" Aviatrix* | join 
(parse "AviatrixVPNSession: User=*, Status=*, Gateway=*, GatewayIP=*, VPNVirtualIP=*, " as User, status, Gateway, gateway_ip, vpn_virtual_ip) as t1, 
(parse "SRC=* DST=* " as src, dst) as t2
on t1.vpn_virtual_ip=t2.src
| t1_gateway as Gateway
| t1_user as User
|count as number_of_connections by t2_src,t2_dst

panels.name: Destination IPs
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" Aviatrix* | join 
(parse "AviatrixVPNSession: User=*, Status=*, Gateway=*, GatewayIP=*, VPNVirtualIP=*, " as User, status, Gateway, gateway_ip, vpn_virtual_ip) as t1, 
(parse "SRC=* " as src| parse "DST=* " as dst) as t2
on t1.vpn_virtual_ip=t2.src
| t1_gateway as Gateway
| t1_user as User
|count as number_of_connections by t2_dst

panels.name: Cumulative VPN session time by Gateway and User
panels.queryString:
_sourceCategory="syslog" AviatrixVPNSession 
|parse "Duration=*:*:*:*," as hr,min,sec,ms
|hr*3600+min*60+sec as dur 
|parse "User=*," as User 
|parse "Gateway=*," as Gateway 
|sum(dur) as Total_Duration by Gateway,User
